name: To Hell With It (DevHellTeam, SlowInfect, Ben77chess, Anthony Posselli, Doug Hawthorn, ewaugh13)
name_original: To Hell With It (DevHellTeam, SlowInfect, Ben77chess, Anthony Posselli, Doug Hawthorn, ewaugh13)
description:
Description:

To Hell With It is a 3rd person hack-n-slash game where you play as Aella; who finds herself battling through Hell's more obscure realms in a "down the rabbit hole" style adventure to retrieve her stolen cat.

Controls:

Keyboard:
- Roll: Space
- Light Attack: Left Mouse Click
- Heavy Attack: Right Mouse Click
- Lock On: Middle Mouse Click
- Inventory: Hold I
- Use Equipped Item: F
- Abilities: 1, 2 or 3
- Jump (in climbing mode): Space
- Interact: E

Controller: 
- Roll: Right Face Button / B
- Light Attack: Left Face Button / X
- Heavy Attack: Top Face Button / Y
- Lock On: Right Stick Button
- Inventory: Hold Right Trigger
- Use Equipped Item: Up on D-Pad
- Abilities: Left Bumper, Right Bumper, or Left Trigger
- Jump (in climbing mode): Bottom Face Button / A
- Interact: Bottom Face Button / A

Team:

Anthony Posselli, Becky Lin, Benjamin Weinberg, Charlie Davidson, Dan Spence, Daniel Osterstock, Dell Barnes, Dominic Austin,  Doug Hawthorn, Eric Waugh,  Hayden Griffin, Jess Adamson, Josh Nelson, Michael Caldwell, Namrata Doddamani, Nicholas Lowe, Ryan Stonecipher, Travis Treadway
